item.description:
The book we are reading is Wildwater Walking Club by Claire Cook...

Just one step at a time. After losing her boyfriend and her job in one fell swoop, Noreen finds it hard to know what the next step is—never mind take it. For the first time in a great many years, Noreen has time to herself. So she puts on a new pair of sneakers and a seriously outdated pair of exercise pants, and walks.
It isn’t long before she’s joined by neighbors Tess and Rosie, two women as lost as she is.

Read the book and join us for a combination of Pot Luck BBQ and lively discussion about the book.

Pot Luck BBQ
Everyone Bring a Dish: Main Course for the grill, Salad, Side, or Dessert.

3 Women Choose a Main Course for the Grill: Chicken, Beef, Hot Dogs, Fish, etc.

2 Women Choose Salad: Tossed, Potato, Macaroni, etc.

3 Women Choose Sides: Potatoes, Rice, Veggies.

2 Women Choose Dessert!

1 Woman Choose paper goods (plates, cups, napkins, utensils)

IMPORTANT!!!!

PLEASE PAY ATTENTION: WHEN YOU RESERVE PLEASE ADD A NOTE AS TO WHAT TYPE OF COURSE YOU ARE BRINGING AND WHAT IT IS SO IT WON'T BE REPEATED.

IF ALL THE MAIN COURSES ARE TAKEN, DO NOT PICK THIS, GO TO ANOTHER CATEGORY. THE SAME GOES FOR SALADS, SIDES AND DESSERTS.

BYOB! or Please bring what you would like to drink
item.how_to_find_us: Barbara will be wearing her Girls Just Wanna Have Fun Pin!

group.name: "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun!" Women Social Meetup Group

item.name: Book Club and Pot Luck BBQ
